metadata.title: CVE-2024-53134 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pmdomain: imx93-blk-ctrl: correct remove pathThe check condition should be 'i < bc->onecell_data.num_domains', not'bc->onecell_data.num_domains' which will make the look never finishand cause kernel panic.Also disable runtime to address"imx93-blk-ctrl 4ac10000.system-controller: Unbalanced pm_runtime_enable!"

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-17.17').
linux-aws package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-1009.10').
